captions.text: So that I can get drunk with this atmosphere and the scent of the night

Here, do as the Romans do
With something that I can stand out
So that I can shine more
Care for me more than anyone
Here, do as the Romans do
No one would expect me to be like this
Tonight I will win your heart

comments.author: D Nguyen

comments.text:
i like this song and the new member is really good, it doesnt mean i dont 
miss Nicole and jiyoung since they were really amazing but im still proud 
of kara and the new member mustve trained really hard for this spot since 
kara isnt a group that sits down after promoting one song. i really like 
her voice, it suits in the group, despite the missing of nicoles and 
jiyoungs voices i actually dont hear any difference from the former kara 
then the kara with a new member. and we got to accept the fact that kara 
isnt a group that keeps their members, they switch members often and thats 
how it is. atleast we have their music, we cant have everything we want. 
and Nicole debuted as a solo artist anyways so keep on supporting!﻿

comments.author: ChocoBabiChan

comments.text:
+ChocoBabiChan This song was released in Aug last year. Immediately after 
that in October they had their concert tour in Japan. In between, they were 
all busy with promotions in variety shows. Hara did a reality show which 
was broadcasted for 7 hours straight by MBC. Youngji is in Roommate 2, 
Gyuri and Seungyeon was in dramas and MC jobs. KARA will be making a 
Japanese comeback this May with Summer Magic and immediately after that, 
they are rumoured to be making a Korean comeback. Please look forward to 
that.
